targets.rawSql:
SELECT d.domain, d.discovered_at, i.ip  
FROM domains d 
JOIN programs p ON p.id = d.program_id 
LEFT JOIN ips i ON i.id = ANY(d.ips) 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name' 
ORDER BY i.ip NULLS LAST
SELECT COUNT(d.id) FROM domains d JOIN programs p ON p.id = d.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT d.domain, d.discovered_at
FROM domains d 
JOIN programs p ON p.id = d.program_id 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name' 
ORDER BY d.discovered_at DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM urls u JOIN programs p ON p.id = u.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'
SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM certificates c JOIN programs p ON p.id = c.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'
SELECT COUNT(n.id) FROM nuclei n JOIN programs p ON p.id = n.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'
SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM ips i JOIN programs p ON p.id = i.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT u.url, u.discovered_at
FROM urls u 
JOIN programs p ON p.id = u.program_id 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name' 
ORDER BY u.discovered_at DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT u.url, u.title, u.status_code, c.serial as certificate FROM urls u JOIN programs p ON p.id = u.program_id LEFT JOIN certificates c ON u.id = ANY(c.url_id) WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT unnested_tech) as unique_tech_count
FROM urls u
CROSS JOIN UNNEST(u.tech) AS unnested_tech
JOIN programs p ON p.id = u.program_id
WHERE u.tech IS NOT NULL AND p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT c.subject_cn, c.discovered_at
FROM certificates c
JOIN programs p ON p.id = c.program_id 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name' 
ORDER BY c.discovered_at DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT c.subject_cn, c.issuer_org, c.serial, c.valid_date, c.expiry_date, array_length(c.subject_an, 1) as subject_an_count, array_length(c.url_id, 1) as url_count FROM certificates c JOIN programs p ON p.id = c.program_id WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT 
    unnested_tech as Tech,
        COUNT(DISTINCT host) as URLCount
        FROM urls
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(tech) AS unnested_tech
        WHERE tech IS NOT NULL
        GROUP BY unnested_tech
        ORDER BY URLCount DESC;

SELECT n.url, n.template_id, n.severity, n.matcher_name
FROM nuclei n
JOIN programs p ON p.id = n.program_id 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name'

SELECT i.ip, i.ptr
FROM ips i
JOIN programs p ON p.id = i.program_id 
WHERE p.name = '$_program_name' 
ORDER BY i.ptr NULLS LAST
